Body: Possible Duplicate:  What advantages or new things have you found when upgrading from Android 2.1 to 2.2 ?  I am going to buy an android phone now i have two choices either to buy a eclair(2.1) version or go for froyo(2.2) version, So i want to know what are the main new features that froyo have so i reject the eclair version phones?
Title: What are the differences between android 2.1 and android 2.2
